login.title: Welcome Back!
login.go_back: Can’t login? You can ERASE your current account and setup a new one
login.cant_proceed: You can’t proceed till you type the word ‘Delete’. With this action you are opting in to erase your current account.
login.type_delete: Type ‘delete’ to erase current account permanently
login.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to erase your account?
login.your_current_account: Your current account, accounts and assets will be
login.you_can_only: You can ONLY recover this account with your
login.mises_browser_does_not: MisesBrowser does not have your Secret Recovery Phrase.
login.vault_error: Error: Cannot unlock without a previous vault.
login.clean_vault_error: MisesBrowser encountered an error due to reaching a storage limit. The local data has been corrupted. Please reinstall MisesBrowser and restore with your Secret Recovery Phrase.

enter_password.title: Enter your password
enter_password.desc: Please enter your password in order to continue

choose_password.title: Create password
choose_password.subtitle: This password will unlock your MisesBrowser account only on this device.
choose_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
choose_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)
choose_password.i_understand: I understand that MisesBrowser cannot recover this password for me.

reset_password.title: Change password
reset_password.subtitle: This password will unlock your MisesBrowser account only on this device.
reset_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
reset_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)
reset_password.i_understand: I understand that MisesBrowser cannot recover this password for me.
reset_password.successfully_changed: Your password has been successfully changed

import_from_seed.title: Import from seed
import_from_seed.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_requirements: Secret Recovery Phrases contain 12, 15, 18, 21, or 24 words
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: This QR code doesn't represent a valid Secret Recovery Phrase

secure_your_account.title: Secure your account
secure_your_account.info_text_1: Take a few moments to finish setting up your Mises Account.
secure_your_account.info_text_2: This will ensure only you can access your account and will let you recover your account if you lose your device

account_backup_step_1.title: Secure your account
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your account by saving your
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: It’s the only way to recover your account if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: I understand that if I lose my Secret Recovery Phrase I will not be able to access my account.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: A Secret Recovery Phrase is a set of twelve words that contains all the information about your account, including your funds. It’s like a secret code used to access your entire account.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: You must keep your Secret Recovery Phrase secret and safe. If someone gets your Secret Recovery Phrase, they’ll gain control over your accounts.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even MisesBrowser can help you recover it.

account_backup_step_1B.title: Secure your account
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
account_backup_step_1B.risks_2: You forget where you put it
account_backup_step_1B.other_options: Other options: Doesn’t have to be paper!
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your account by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in a place you trust.
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: It’s the only way to recover your account if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your account.
account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_2.title: Grab a pen and paper
account_backup_step_2.info: Next step is to write your Secret Recovery Phrase down.

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your account.
account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_3.title: Is anyone watching?
account_backup_step_3.info_text: Make sure no other human or robot is watching your screen. If your Secret Recovery Phrase is copied, it can be used on other devices to steal your funds

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your account.
account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: Carefully write down these words on paper. Their order matters.
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: You'll be asked to re-enter it on the next screen
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

account_backup_step_5.error_message: The order of the words is incorrect. Please make sure you wrote it down correctly and go to the previous screen if it is necessary
account_backup_step_5.title: Confirm Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_5.info_text: Insert each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: This was to ensure you follow this security measure

account_backup_step_6.title: Security Tips
account_backup_step_6.info_text: MisesBrowser cannot recover your Secret Recovery Phrase if you lose it
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: Keep multiple backups of your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: Store the phrase in a trusted password manager and paper backups in a safe place
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: Never share this phrase with anyone
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase if you go to
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: You are all backed up and ready to go!
account_backup_step_6.copy_seed_phrase: COPY Secret Recovery Phrase TO CLIPBOARD

manual_backup_step_1.action: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.info: This is your Secret Recovery Phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
manual_backup_step_1.reveal: Tap to reveal your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.watching: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

manual_backup_step_2.info: Select each word in the order it was presented to you.

manual_backup_step_3.success: You’ve successfully protected your account. Remember to keep your Secret Recovery Phrase safe, it's your responsibility!
manual_backup_step_3.recover: MisesBrowser cannot recover your account should you lose it. You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase in Settings > Security & Privacy.
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: Leave yourself a hint. Write the location / where you saved it to remind yourself how you can access it. This information does not leave your device.
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: Do not use this to write your Secret Recovery Phrase.

error_screen.title: An error occured
error_screen.subtitle: Your information can't be shown. Don’t worry, your wallet and funds are safe.
error_screen.submit_ticket_1: Please report this issue so we can fix it:
error_screen.submit_ticket_2: Take a screenshot of this screen.
error_screen.submit_ticket_7: Please include the error message and the screenshot.
error_screen.save_seedphrase_3: & re-install the app. Note: you can NOT restore your wallet without your Secret Recovery Phrase.

drawer.submit_feedback_message: Choose the type of feedback to send.
drawer.logout_title: Do you really want to log out?

browser.title: Browser
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask is your wallet and browser for the decentralized web. Have a look around!
browser.no_tabs_desc: To browse the decentralized web, add a new tab
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: We couldn't resolve that ENS name
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: Do you really want to remove this site from your favorites?

accounts.remove_account_message: Do you really want to remove this account?

webview_error.title: Ooops! something went wrong...
webview_error.message: We weren't able to load that page.
